Text:
thank you so much slicknick for your hard work!!!
cheers from belgium
Thankyou for the upload, kills me at my rediculous third world download speed to have to wait a week to download 2.4gb though!
No for the live races I am just uploading 480p. The next 3 races are live too.

Thanx SlickNick , I am interested in buying a HDTV recorder , could I ask what you use to record these Supercross , & what program you use to cut commercials . Great Quality , would like to share some stuff of my own . Thanx alot from Australia :)
I use the Hauppauge HD-PVR to record. Then I cut commercials and save the file as an uncompressed avi file with Sony Vegas. Then I use Handbrake (freeware) to render the file in x264 mp4 format.

Thanx SlickNick , I read up a little on the unit you talk of , could you clarify please , you connect your TV OUT (via component cable) to the Hauppauge HD-PVR IN & then use the USB2 from the Hauppauge HD-PVR to connect to a laptop to record to computer hard drive ? So you must have a computer near your TV ? Sorry for all the questions , but I cannot see this in any of the reviews I am reading about the Hauppauge HD-PVR , and kken as to get this bought & hooked up , Thanx for your help in advance .
Cable box output not TV output. You are going to use a laptop? I hope it is powerful because HD videos uses a lot of processing power. I have a quad core processor on the desktop I use.
Awesome work as usual, thanks again from New Zealand! Hope you manage to get the Legends of Supercross as well :-)
Thanks for SX uploads...I 've just been watching rd 8 on live with bad internet quality so really impatient to download your torrent...thanks....
